projectInfo.title: VYB Co. | Web
projectInfo.summary: Website identity, formed around beautiful imagery
projectInfo.introduction: The site's layout was created based on the Japanese minimalism, made to be conservative with words and heavy on the visuals. Images take up much of the screen space, so the simplicity compliments this use of space. Languages: HTML, CSS, JS (JQuery), PHP Plugins Used: DM_redirect.js Check out the mocku-up template here.

categories.description: Default post category. Use this Category for project Posts. These will not show up in the Stream
categories.category_description: Default post category. Use this Category for project Posts. These will not show up in the Stream

palette.description:
VYB Co is a lifestyle brand meant to enhance all parts of a millennial’s life. VYB is also bold and began as a screen-printing service.

One method of screen printing is known as CMYK process printing, where the print is divided into four silk screens for each color of CMYK.

content.rendered:
The site’s layout was created based on the Japanese minimalism, made to be conservative with words and heavy on the visuals. Images take up much of the screen space, so the simplicity compliments this use of space.

Languages: HTML, CSS, JS (JQuery), PHP

Plugins Used: DM_redirect.js

Check out the mocku-up template here.

acf.palette_description:
VYB Co is a lifestyle brand meant to enhance all parts of a millennial’s life. VYB is also bold and began as a screen-printing service.

One method of screen printing is known as CMYK process printing, where the print is divided into four silk screens for each color of CMYK.
